entry.title: Why I'm Breaking Up With WordPress
entry.summary: Like many before me, I have to admit … I’m leaving WordPress. It’s not because there is anything wrong with the CMS. In fact, I absolutely love it. It has been a great platform to work with, and I’ll use it in my professional world.
